body:
Well, only `weight_orig` shows up in the parameters, so this situation might not be too uncommon:
I'm looking at this from the perspective of my (possibly not terribly good) [SN-GAN implementation](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/t-vi/pytorch-tvmisc/blob/master/wasserstein-distance/sn_projection_cgan_64x64_1000c.ipynb)
For the generator update I do
```
discriminator.eval()
for p in discriminator.parameters():
   p.requires_grad = False
```
this sees weight_orig, but not weight. So weight_orig will be `requires_grad = False` and weight `requires_grad = True`. One might argue that setting weight's requires_grad to weight_orig's is less surprising here.
